pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Data | AquaEssence AquaEssence HOME ABOUT US Products Contacts Privacy Policy At AquaEssence, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our website or interact with our products and services. Information We Collect We collect various types of information from our users, including: Personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and mailing address. Non-personal information such as your IP address, browser type, and device information. Cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze website traffic. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for various purposes, including: Providing and improving our products and services. Communicating with you about your inquiries, orders, and account information. Personalizing your experience and delivering targeted advertisements. Complying with legal obligations and protecting our rights and interests. Information Sharing and Disclosure We may share your information with third-party service providers and business partners who assist us in operating our website and delivering our products and services. We may also disclose your information in response to legal requests or to protect our rights and interests. Your Rights and Choices You have the right to access, update, and delete your personal information. You may also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time. Please contact us if you have any questions or concerns about your privacy rights. Updates to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or to comply with legal requirements. We encourage you to review this page periodically for the latest information about our privacy practices. AquaEssence website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site.
